A **zruty**, z, is a type of [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")*. The zruty is a [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong") and [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivorous "Carnivorous") [humanoid](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid") [animal](/wiki/Animal "Animal") that is the only member of the [zruty](/wiki/Zruty_\(monster_class\) "Zruty (monster class)") [monster class](/wiki/Monster_class "Monster class").

A zruty has two claw attacks and a bite attack.

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Generation](#Generation)

- [2 Strategy](#Strategy)

- [3 History](#History)

- [4 Origin](#Origin)

- [5 Variants](#Variants)

  - [5.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [5.2 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [5.3 SpliceHack](#SpliceHack)
  - [5.4 EvilHack](#EvilHack)
  - [5.5 Hack'EM](#Hack.27EM)

- [6 Encyclopedia entry](#Encyclopedia_entry)

- [7 References](#References)

## Generation

Randomly generated zruties are always created hostile.

Hostile zruties can be created via the [summon nasties](/wiki/Summon_nasties "Summon nasties") [monster spell](/wiki/Monster_spell "Monster spell").

## Strategy

Though zruties are very slow at 8 [speed](/wiki/Speed "Speed"), they can hit unwary or poorly-armored [heroes](/wiki/Hero "Hero") quite hard and should be handled with care. Like most animals, the zruty lacks any [MR score](/wiki/Magic_resistance_\(monster\) "Magic resistance (monster)"), so [wands](/wiki/Wand "Wand") and [spells](/wiki/Spell "Spell") are generally effective, especially for heroes that are less melee-proficient or else lacking in [AC](/wiki/AC "AC") or [HP](/wiki/HP "HP").

## History

The zruty first appears in [Hack 1.0](/wiki/Hack_1.0 "Hack 1.0").

## Origin

The zruty is a creature that likely originates from Polish or Slovakian folklore, according to an [RGRN](/wiki/RGRN "RGRN") discussion[\[1\]](#cite_note-1) - its name is derived from the Slovak word *žrút* (plural *žrúti* or *žrúty*), which means "glutton". The encyclopedia entry originates from a direct quote of *[The Mythology of All Races](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Mythology_of_All_Races "wikipedia:The Mythology of All Races") Vol. 3*, which describes the zruty or "Ozruti" as a type of wild and gigantic being that inhabits the wildernesses of the [Tatra Mountains](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tatra_Mountains "wikipedia:Tatra Mountains"), located on the border between Poland and Slovakia. The word "ozruti" shares a similar root to "zruty" and may mean "ogre" or "giant"; it may also be used informally to refer to an excessively large object.

## Variants

[Variants](/wiki/Variants "Variants") that include [zouthern animals](/wiki/Zouthern_animal "Zouthern animal") move the zruty to the ​Y [apelike creature](/wiki/Apelike_creature "Apelike creature") monster class to accommodate the repurposed z glyph - this primarily applies to SLASH'EM and other variants based on it.

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), the zruty is moved to the apelike creature monster class as Y to make room for zouthern animals. Its stats are identical to its appearance in vanilla *NetHack*, but it can generate as peaceful for a neutral character, it can be tamed with a [banana](/wiki/Banana "Banana") like other apelike creatures, and it does not generate in [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom") or via the summon nasties monster spell. This also applies to [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM").

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), zruties may be generated as [minions](/wiki/Minion "Minion") of [Offler](/wiki/Offler "Offler").

### SpliceHack

In [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"), zruties are moved to the apelike creature monster class as Y to make room for zouthern animals.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), the zruty's base speed is increased to 12, its MR score is increased to 30, and its [monster difficulty](/wiki/Monster_difficulty "Monster difficulty") is increased to 12; it also has a bite attack and two claw attacks, all of which are 3d6, and the claw attack can inflict knockback.

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), the zruty has its traits from SLASH'EM and the same stats as in EvilHack.

## Encyclopedia entry

The zruty are wild and gigantic beings, living in the wildernesses of the Tatra mountains.

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [Google Groups - Plural for zruty?](https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.roguelike.nethack/c/nJfbugiZJvc/m/Fix_YpYnrJUJ)

[![This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.7. Click here for more information.](/images/f/f7/Nh367-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.7. Click here for more information.")

Zruty

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
z zruty
Difficulty 11
Attacks Claw 3d4, Claw 3d4, Bite 3d6
z zruty
Difficulty 11
Attacks

Claw 3d4, Claw 3d4, Bite 3d6

Base level 9
Base experience 186
Speed 8
Base AC 3
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 2 (Quite rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 1200
Nutritional value 600
Size Large
Resistances None
Resistances conveyed None

A zruty:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is an animal.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is strong.
  • can be seen through infravision.
Reference monst.c#line974

A zruty, z, is a type of monster that appears in NetHack. The zruty is a strong and carnivorous humanoid animal that is the only member of the zruty monster class.

A zruty has two claw attacks and a bite attack.

Contents

  • 1 Generation
  • 2 Strategy
  • 3 History
  • 4 Origin
  • 5 Variants
    • 5.1 SLASH'EM
    • 5.2 dNetHack
    • 5.3 SpliceHack
    • 5.4 EvilHack
    • 5.5 Hack'EM
  • 6 Encyclopedia entry
  • 7 References

Generation

Randomly generated zruties are always created hostile.

Hostile zruties can be created via the summon nasties monster spell.

Strategy

Though zruties are very slow at 8 speed, they can hit unwary or poorly-armored heroes quite hard and should be handled with care. Like most animals, the zruty lacks any MR score, so wands and spells are generally effective, especially for heroes that are less melee-proficient or else lacking in AC or HP.

History

The zruty first appears in Hack 1.0.

Origin

The zruty is a creature that likely originates from Polish or Slovakian folklore, according to an RGRN discussion[1] - its name is derived from the Slovak word žrút (plural žrúti or žrúty), which means "glutton". The encyclopedia entry originates from a direct quote of The Mythology of All Races Vol. 3, which describes the zruty or "Ozruti" as a type of wild and gigantic being that inhabits the wildernesses of the Tatra Mountains, located on the border between Poland and Slovakia. The word "ozruti" shares a similar root to "zruty" and may mean "ogre" or "giant"; it may also be used informally to refer to an excessively large object.

Variants

Variants that include zouthern animals move the zruty to the ​Y apelike creature monster class to accommodate the repurposed z glyph - this primarily applies to SLASH'EM and other variants based on it.

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, the zruty is moved to the apelike creature monster class as Y to make room for zouthern animals. Its stats are identical to its appearance in vanilla NetHack, but it can generate as peaceful for a neutral character, it can be tamed with a banana like other apelike creatures, and it does not generate in Gehennom or via the summon nasties monster spell. This also applies to SlashTHEM.

dNetHack

In dNetHack, zruties may be generated as minions of Offler.

SpliceHack

In SpliceHack, zruties are moved to the apelike creature monster class as Y to make room for zouthern animals.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, the zruty's base speed is increased to 12, its MR score is increased to 30, and its monster difficulty is increased to 12; it also has a bite attack and two claw attacks, all of which are 3d6, and the claw attack can inflict knockback.

Hack'EM

In Hack'EM, the zruty has its traits from SLASH'EM and the same stats as in EvilHack.

Encyclopedia entry

The zruty are wild and gigantic beings, living in the wildernesses of the Tatra mountains.

References

  1. ↑ Google Groups - Plural for zruty?

A '''zruty''', {{monsym|zruty}}, is a type of [[monster]] that appears in ''[[NetHack]]''. The zruty is a [[strong]] and [[carnivorous]] [[humanoid]] [[animal]] that is the only member of the [[Zruty (monster class)|zruty]] [[monster class]]. 

A zruty has two claw attacks and a bite attack.

==Generation==
Randomly generated zruties are always created hostile.

Hostile zruties can be created via the [[summon nasties]] [[monster spell]].

==Strategy==
Though zruties are very slow at 8 [[speed]], they can hit unwary or poorly-armored [[hero]]es quite hard and should be handled with care. Like most animals, the zruty lacks any [[Magic resistance (monster)|MR score]], so [[wand]]s and [[spell]]s are generally effective, especially for heroes that are less melee-proficient or else lacking in [[AC]] or [[HP]].

==History==
The zruty first appears in [[Hack 1.0]].

==Origin==
The zruty is a creature that likely originates from Polish or Slovakian folklore, according to an [[RGRN]] discussion<ref>[https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.roguelike.nethack/c/nJfbugiZJvc/m/Fix_YpYnrJUJ Google Groups - Plural for zruty?]</ref> - its name is derived from the Slovak word ''žrút'' (plural ''žrúti'' or ''žrúty''), which means "glutton". The encyclopedia entry originates from a direct quote of ''[[wikipedia:The Mythology of All Races|The Mythology of All Races]] Vol. 3'', which describes the zruty or "Ozruti" as a type of wild and gigantic being that inhabits the wildernesses of the [[wikipedia:Tatra Mountains|Tatra Mountains]], located on the border between Poland and Slovakia. The word "ozruti" shares a similar root to "zruty" and may mean "ogre" or "giant"; it may also be used informally to refer to an excessively large object.

==Variants==
[[Variants]] that include [[zouthern animal]]s move the zruty to the {{monclass|Y}} monster class to accommodate the repurposed {{white|z}} glyph - this primarily applies to SLASH'EM and other variants based on it.

===SLASH'EM===
In [[SLASH'EM]], the zruty is moved to the apelike creature monster class as {{green|Y}} to make room for zouthern animals. Its stats are identical to its appearance in vanilla ''NetHack'', but it can generate as peaceful for a neutral character, it can be tamed with a [[banana]] like other apelike creatures, and it does not generate in [[Gehennom]] or via the summon nasties monster spell. This also applies to [[SlashTHEM]].

===dNetHack===
In [[dNetHack]], zruties may be generated as [[minion]]s of [[Offler]].

===SpliceHack===
In [[SpliceHack]], zruties are moved to the apelike creature monster class as {{brown|Y}} to make room for zouthern animals.

===EvilHack===
In [[EvilHack]], the zruty's base speed is increased to 12, its MR score is increased to 30, and its [[monster difficulty]] is increased to 12; it also has a bite attack and two claw attacks, all of which are 3d6, and the claw attack can inflict knockback.

===Hack'EM===
In [[Hack'EM]], the zruty has its traits from SLASH'EM and the same stats as in EvilHack.

==Encyclopedia entry==
{{encyclopedia|
The zruty are wild and gigantic beings, living in the wildernesses of the Tatra mountains.
}}
